reviews.review_msg: He is amazing. Wonderful prof. The Course is kinda Greece-oriented. So you will do well if you know Greek history. You'll have to read extra readings to score well. 4 discussions and 2 exams are fine if you go to lectures and learn the materials. He gives out good feedbacks and answers all questions.

Great prof. Passionate about the topic, clear about expectations. I enjoyed the class (I dig history). Exams require basic review and some critical thinking for essay questions. Show up to class and skim over readings for tutorial. He's available for help and super reasonable.
A great guy and a great professor! Approachable and fair. If I can take more classes with him I will. All readings for class are online.
